title: Atomically dispersed nanozyme-based synergistic mild photothermal/nanocatalytic therapy for eradicating multidrug-resistant bacteria and accelerating infected wound healing
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7157-7171
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08431K, Paper

Ying Qu, Liang Zhuang, Wuren Bao, Chunlin Li, Hongyu Chen, Shan He, Hui Yao, Quanjin Si
A multifunctional Cu/Mn dual single-atom nanozyme-based synergistic mild photothermal/nanocatalytic therapy was developed for a MDR bacterium-infected wound.
